text: Egha Barnabas, me asem Sus a gatɨ. Pol a mɨgɨrɨgɨabar faragha zuir gumazim, kamaghɨn me asem Hermes a gatɨ.14:12 Grighɨn gumazamiziba nɨghnɨzir gavgavim kamaghɨn iti, aser avɨriba uaghan iti. Men aser mam, Sus, a men asebar gumazir dapanir ekiam. Ezɨ Hermes, a men aser akaba inigha me bagha izim.
